mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO relation_subject_data ( subject_data_code, tenant_code, org_code, create_time, modify_time, remark, subject_code, team_quality_num, group_quality_num, province_quality_num, city_quality_num, join_num, read_num, like_num, collect_num, forward_num, comment_num, share_num ) select REPLACE (UUID(), '-', '') AS rec_code, bi.tenant_code as tenant_code, bi.org_code as org_code, bi.create_time AS create_time, bi.modify_time AS modify_time, bi.remark as remark, bi.blog_code as subject_code, bd.team_quality_num as team_quality_num, bd.group_quality_num as group_quality_num, bd.province_quality_num as province_quality_num, bd.city_quality_num as city_quality_num, 0 as join_num, bd.read_num as read_num, bd.like_num as like_num, bd.collect_num as collect_num, bd.forward_num as forward_num, bd.comment_num as comment_num, bd.share_num as share_num from relation_recommend rr left join blog_info bi on rr.subject_code = bi.blog_code left join blog_data bd on bd.blog_code = bi.blog_code where rr.subject_class = 2 and bi.blog_code is not null

INSERT IGNORE INTO relation_subject_data ( subject_data_code, tenant_code, org_code, create_time, modify_time, remark, subject_code, team_quality_num, group_quality_num, province_quality_num, city_quality_num, join_num, read_num, like_num, collect_num, forward_num, comment_num, share_num ) select REPLACE (UUID(), '-', '') AS rec_code, bi.tenant_code as tenant_code, bi.org_code as org_code, bi.create_time AS create_time, bi.modify_time AS modify_time, bi.remark as remark, bi.mblog_code as subject_code, bd.team_essence_num as team_quality_num, bd.group_essence_num as group_quality_num, bd.province_essence_num as province_quality_num, bd.city_essence_num as city_quality_num, 0 as join_num, 0 as read_num, bd.praise_num as like_num, bd.collect_num as collect_num, bd.forward_num as forward_num, bd.comment_num as comment_num, 0 as share_num from relation_recommend rr left join mblog_info bi on rr.subject_code = bi.mblog_code left join mblog_num bd on bd.subject_code = bi.mblog_code and bd.num_source = 1 where rr.subject_class = 1 and bi.mblog_code is not null and bd.subject_code is not null
